title: Avacado 🥑 Banana 🍌 Smoothie | Healthy Diet 🙂
content:
Smoothie: Healthy drink Servings : 2 Duration: 5 minutes Now a days, Everyone wants fast and quick recipes at home with in few minutes. Today, I’m sharing a new combination of fruits 🍌 along with cardamom powder, milk, dates and few add ons. It’s super healthy, frothy and delicious smoothie 🥛. I hope you like it and try out my recipes. Health benefits of avacado 🥑 & Banana 🍌: Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Banana - 1 - Ripped - Chopped
  • Curd/ plain yogurt - 1 Tb sp
  • Avacado - 1/2 - Chopped
  • Milk - 300 ml
  • Sugar - 1 Tb sp
  • Dates - 2 -
  • Walnuts - 1 Tb sp
  • Cardamom Powder - 3 - powdered ( Without skin)
Procedure:
  • Add all ingredients in blender, select smoothie button or blend till smooth paste
  • Pour in serving glasses
  • Garnish with finely chopped walnuts and green colored sugar ( optional)
  • Happy cooking 🥛 & Have a great weekend 😇
